name: Digital Terrarium: Pogona Virtual Pet
summary: Digital Terrarium - Pogona is a simple virtual pet game. As the title implies, it's a virtual terrarium set up to care for a pogona lizard, more commonly known as a bearded dragon. The game features some customization options for your terrarium, as well as the color morph of your bearded dragon, which is a simple AI that wanders the tank and drinks periodically, as well as eats the cricket you can drop into the tank. It also includes an infographic with some educational text about bearded dragons.
